thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Delivery company is a joke...I could track on their website that parcel was in Dublin on Friday afternoon, they make a note that they were trying to ring me but there was no answer and no chance to leave the message, which is complete b..#Â¥$<~ . On Monday they put note in their tracking system that delivery carried out for tomorrow.... Finally I received my parcel on Tuesday. Finally I can enjoy my lovely chai late :) Thank you Evergreen :)
